about_the_game:
Explore, Capture, Create – Your Virtual Tabletop Adventure Awaits!

Unleash your creativity with our immersive 3D map exploration and screenshot utility, perfect for Virtual Tabletop (VTT) Dungeon Masters and fantasy enthusiasts!

Key Features:

  • Expansive 3D Island Map
    Dive into a meticulously crafted island. Wander through the town and explore its castle, scale rolling hillsides, and uncover countless areas to create unique battle maps.

  • Seamless 3rd-Person Exploration
    Take control of a your character and freely roam the vast landscape. Discover points of interest and gather inspiration for your next Dungeons & Dragons session.

  • Grid Mode for VTT Maps
    Switch to top-down Grid Mode with a single click. Capture stunning, high-resolution screenshots of any area, complete with a customizable grid overlay. Perfectly scaled for use in Virtual Tabletops like Roll20 or Foundry VTT.

  • User-Friendly Tools
    Fine-tune grid colors, and camera angles to ensure your maps meet your exact specifications.

  • Endless Inspiration
    Whether you’re creating maps for combat encounters, exploration, or storytelling, this tool provides a treasure trove of inspiration and resources for DMs and players alike.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I7 930 | AMD® FX 6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 (3GB), Intel® Arc™ A380, or ATI Radeon™ RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I7 2700K | AMD® Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2060, Intel® Arc™ A770, or ATI Radeon™ RX 5600XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Explore a vast 3D island in 3rd-person, then switch to Grid Mode to capture top-down screenshots for your Virtual Tabletop (VTT) games! Perfect for Dungeon Masters seeking immersive, ready-to-use environments.
